title: RedditBoss
author: RedditBoss
created_time: December 07, 2023, 07:20:52 AMLast edit: December 08, 2023, 11:58:56 PM by RedditBoss
content: hi guys.I would like to introduce you my service: RedditBoss.comRedditBoss.com is a service that provides high quality upvotes, but also downvotes on platform Reddit.You can boost your posts to become number one, in hot, the front eventually!But you can also downvote posts you don't like and kill them eventually!Your dick will ultimately grow bigger with this tool, that is enviable. You now control the flow of information! You are the BOSS now.I recommend using this tool for (onlyfans) advertising or for having fun with people/friends. The fate is in your hands.Questions:Q: What payment methods do you accept? A: For now just cryptocurrencies. Q: How long after posting can I start the voting process? A: We recommend you start it immediately or after a few minutes. Make sure your link is live. Q: Refunds? A: We'll provide you a refund if our votes don't go through.Q: What if subreddit mod deleted my post? A: In this case we can't guarantee a refund. Make sure to follow the rules of the targeted subreddit, and don't be too obvious. But ask!Q: Can I get (shadow)banned? A: We don't have records of any bans. Q: How fast are the votes? A: ~100 votes will take ~20-30 minutes. Q: How to contact you? A: Under this post, our website or our telegram: @RedditBossSupport  We are offering a test vouch to 5 (reputable) people on the forum. Please reply below with your username on the site.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: How long have you been doing this checking the age of your site I got this https://www.whois.com/whois/redditboss.comQuoteDomain:redditboss.comRegistrar:NameCheap, Inc.Registered On: 2023-12-07Expires On: 2024-12-07Updated On: 2023-12-07Today happens to be the 7th of this month December so you bought this domain this morning configured it and posted it here right away, it's good that it's propagated right away all I know is it will take 24 to 48 propagations, how about the script have you fully test it.You have to convince us by posting your Reddit accounts here so we can see if you tried and tested your service on your own account, you have to walk your talk.

We are fairly new, no track record we can show you, but we have roughly a year of active experience. If you are interested, we can give you some balance on the site and you can test it with your own posts on Reddit. Simply reply here with your username. Thank you!

Yes, I'm sorry. It's now inside the post. Regarding the service, we've tested it and played with it numerous of times, however I believe that by posting on which accounts we've used to boost the votes it wouldn't provide meaningful value. The posts could simply be good by itself and therefore it doesn't necessarily prove the functionality of our service. In this case we prefer if someone can test it *directly* with his own posts and let us know his feedback.  Thank you.

I actually chinecked him, and I saw that it was necessary to subscribe to perform the upvote. I guess I would buy or pay for my upvote depending on the plan you have there on the platform you showed here.For example, if I choose 12$, I have the opportunity to make 3 votes per minute, and if I total it in 1 hour, I will earn 14.4$, so I can grow by 2.4$ within 1 hour. That's why you can't show anything proven, or is what you say true? In short, we come out the losers and you are the winners. It's hard to tell the truth. First, prove that it's true.

comments.body: Quote from: bettercrypto on December 13, 2023, 01:03:10 PMQuote from: RedditBoss on December 09, 2023, 12:01:35 AMQuote from: robelneo on December 08, 2023, 12:54:44 PMQuote from: RedditBoss on December 08, 2023, 12:32:10 PMQuote from: robelneo on December 07, 2023, 11:15:07 AMHow long have you been doing this checking the age of your site I got this https://www.whois.com/whois/redditboss.comQuoteDomain:redditboss.comRegistrar:NameCheap, Inc.Registered On: 2023-12-07Expires On: 2024-12-07Updated On: 2023-12-07Today happens to be the 7th of this month December so you bought this domain this morning configured it and posted it here right away, it's good that it's propagated right away all I know is it will take 24 to 48 propagations, how about the script have you fully test it.You have to convince us by posting your Reddit accounts here so we can see if you tried and tested your service on your own account, you have to walk your talk.You are correct. We are fairly new, no track record we can show you, but we have roughly a year of active experience. If you are interested, we can give you some balance on the site and you can test it with your own posts on Reddit. Simply reply here with your username. Thank you!If you're offering a test for vouch you should say so in your post or you can create a separate thread for that, you did not mention your Reddit account for us to see how popular your account on Reddit is and the number of upvotes it has, if you're offering this you have to test it first on your own account. Yes, I'm sorry. It's now inside the post. Regarding the service, we've tested it and played with it numerous of times, however I believe that by posting on which accounts we've used to boost the votes it wouldn't provide meaningful value. The posts could simply be good by itself and therefore it doesn't necessarily prove the functionality of our service. In this case we prefer if someone can test it *directly* with his own posts and let us know his feedback.  Thank you.You want someone else to try it on the platform you're talking about. I actually chinecked him, and I saw that it was necessary to subscribe to perform the upvote. I guess I would buy or pay for my upvote depending on the plan you have there on the platform you showed here.For example, if I choose 12$, I have the opportunity to make 3 votes per minute, and if I total it in 1 hour, I will earn 14.4$, so I can grow by 2.4$ within 1 hour. That's why you can't show anything proven, or is what you say true? In short, we come out the losers and you are the winners. It's hard to tell the truth. First, prove that it's true.I will explain. 1. On the platform you can purchase votes: The more you buy, the less you pay per vote. It is not a subscription, it is a one time payment. 2. If you decide to get 150 votes, that is $12. You can use these votes on as many as 30 posts because 5 votes is a minimum to be sent towards a post or you can use them all towards one post. You can also send 5 (or more; 200 is maximum) votes towards the same post multiple times. 3. The speed is 3 votes per minute; per submitted request from our service. This is how fast the votes are going to change on your reddit post. You can also send your votes towards multiple posts, and each submitted request is going to have a speed 3 votes per minute. You can also send towards the same post twice and the speed is going to become 6 upvotes per minute. (We will change the wording on our website)To explain this a little bit further, on reddit normally if you create a really good post you are unlikely to get 10 votes a minute! This could make your post look strange and that's why we choose 3 votes per minute (per submitted request). It looks much more organic. 4. I hope my reply made it a bit clearer. If I showed you an account with boosted votes you couldn't tell if the votes were boosted by our service or if the post was simply good and people upvoted it themself. In this case we would offer a vouch/test copy (free votes) to reputable members for free, for them to try our service and leave a feedback below this post. Why use our service? Because it guarantees you that your post will be seen. On reddit people need to upvote, but even if your post is good, you might be unlucky and have your post shown to the wrong people that are not going to leave you a vote and suddenly new posts flood the subreddit and your post is no longer seen and is less likely to rank good. This is how reddit works.Let me know if you have any more questions!

comments.author: RedditBoss
comments.body: Quote from: Bill buffalo on December 19, 2023, 02:03:12 PMI would like to buy a reddit address hello, what do you mean with "reddit address"? thank you

comments.author: RedditBoss
comments.body: Quote from: Bill buffalo on December 21, 2023, 05:49:22 AMI would like to buy a reddit account Hello, we unfortunately aren't selling reddit accounts. We are selling up/down-votes for reddit posts. Thank you.
